trans-unit.source: Returns detailed information about the schema exception.
trans-unit.target: 傳回結構描述例外狀況的詳細資訊。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException> class may contain sensitive information that should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException>類別可能包含不應該公開受信任的案例中的機密資訊。

trans-unit.source: For example, the <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>屬性結構描述檔案造成例外狀況傳回的 URI 路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。

trans-unit.source: Exceptions should be properly handled so that this sensitive information is not exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: 使機密資訊不會出現在受信任的案例，就應該正確地處理例外狀況。

trans-unit.source: The following example shows the use of the `XmlSchemaException` class.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例示範使用`XmlSchemaException`類別。

trans-unit.source: Streams all the <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> properties into the <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> class for the given <see langword="StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 將所有 <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> 屬性資料流至指定之 <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 的 <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤狀況的 <see langword="string" /> 描述。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> class with the exception message specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況訊息，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: SerializationInfo.
trans-unit.target: SerializationInfo。

trans-unit.source: StreamingContext.
trans-unit.target: StreamingContext。

trans-unit.source: Constructs a new <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> object with the given <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> and <see langword="StreamingContext" /> information that contains all the properties of the <see langword="XmlSchemaException" />.
trans-unit.target: 以指定的 <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> 和 <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 資訊建構包含 <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 所有屬性的新 <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> 物件。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤狀況的 <see langword="string" /> 描述。

trans-unit.source: The original T:System.Exception object that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致這個例外狀況的原始 T:System.Exception 物件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> class with the exception message and original <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> object that caused this exception specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用例外狀況訊息和導致這個指定之例外狀況的原始 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> 物件，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: A <see langword="string" /> description of the error condition.
trans-unit.target: 錯誤狀況的 <see langword="string" /> 描述。

trans-unit.source: The original T:System.Exception object that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致這個例外狀況的原始 T:System.Exception 物件。

trans-unit.source: The line number of the XML that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致這個例外狀況的 XML 行號。

trans-unit.source: The line position of the XML that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致這個例外狀況的 XML 行位置。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> class with the exception message specified, and the original <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> object, line number, and line position of the XML that cause this exception specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的例外狀況訊息，以及導致這個指定之例外狀況的原始 <see cref="T:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException" /> 物件、XML 中的行號和行位置，初始化 <see cref="T:System.Exception" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="SerializationInfo" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="StreamingContext" /> information.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 資訊。

trans-unit.source: Streams all the <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> properties into the <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> class for the given <see langword="StreamingContext" />.
trans-unit.target: 將所有 <see langword="XmlSchemaException" /> 屬性資料流至指定之 <see langword="SerializationInfo" /> 的 <see langword="StreamingContext" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line number indicating where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得行號，指出發生錯誤的位置。

trans-unit.source: The line number indicating where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示發生錯誤之位置的行號。

trans-unit.source: Gets the line position indicating where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 取得行位置，指出發生錯誤的位置。

trans-unit.source: The line position indicating where the error occurred.
trans-unit.target: 指示發生錯誤之位置的行位置。

trans-unit.source: Gets the description of the error condition of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個例外狀況之錯誤條件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The description of the error condition of this exception.
trans-unit.target: 這個例外狀況之錯誤條件的描述。

trans-unit.source: The <see langword="XmlSchemaObject" /> that produced the <see langword="XmlSchemaException" />.
trans-unit.target: 產生 <see langword="XmlSchemaObject" /> 的 <see langword="XmlSchemaException" />。

trans-unit.source: A valid object instance represents a structural validation error in the XML Schema Object Model (SOM).
trans-unit.target: 表示 XML 結構描述物件模型 (SOM) 中之結構化驗證錯誤的有效物件執行個體。

trans-unit.source: This can be queried for the `LineNumber`, `LinePosition`, and `SourceUri` of the XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema file.
trans-unit.target: 這可以查詢`LineNumber`， `LinePosition`，和`SourceUri`XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述檔案。

trans-unit.source: A return value of `nil` indicates a syntactic parsing validation error in the SOM.
trans-unit.target: 傳回值為`nil`表示 SOM 的語法剖析的驗證錯誤

trans-unit.source: Gets the Uniform Resource Identifier (URI) location of the schema that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 取得導致該例外狀況之結構描述的統一資源識別元 (URI) 位置。

trans-unit.source: The URI location of the schema that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: 導致該例外狀況之結構描述的 URI 位置。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property returns the URI path to the schema file that caused the exception.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>屬性結構描述檔案造成例外狀況傳回的 URI 路徑。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A> property should not be exposed in untrusted scenarios.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.Schema.XmlSchemaException.SourceUri%2A>屬性不應該公開受信任的案例中。
